title: Are there any businesses coming to the Leland area in the near future, such as Goodwill, fast food, or hardware stores?
text:
Unfortunately we can't answer all speculative questions about which
businesses are or aren't coming to a specific area.



Here's a recent blog post that might answer part of your question:



http://business.blogs.starnewsonline.com/10799/brunswick-forest-says-sales-best-in-3-years/
